title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 4 - Low Pressure Boilers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 4 - Low Pressure Boilers

State Regulations

Subpart 4-1 - General Provisions (§ 4-1.1 to 4-1.16)

Subpart 4-2 - Certified Boiler Inspectors (§ 4-2.1 to 4-2.9)

Subpart 4-3 - Authorized Insurance Companies (§ 4-3.1 to 4-3.3)

Subpart 4-4 - Inspection Of Boilers (§ 4-4.0 to 4-4.5)

Subpart 4-5 - Specific Requirements For Low Pressure Heating System Boilers (§ 4-5.1 to 4-5.18)

Subpart 4-6 - Installations, Repairs And Replacement Of Low Pressure Heating System Boilers (§ 4-6.1 to 4-6.10 to 4-6.11)

Subpart 4-7 - Heat Generating Apparatus-general Provisions (§ 4-7.1 to 4-7.5)

Subpart 4-8 - Heat Generating Apparatus-special Provisions (§ 4-8.1 to 4-8.8)

Subpart 4-9 - Flame Safeguard Controls For Gas-fired Boilers (§ 4-9.1 to 4-9.5)

Subpart 4-10 - General Requirements For Oil Burners (§ 4-10.1 to 4-10.9)

Subpart 4-11 - Flame Safeguard Control Requirements For All Oil Burners Installed Before March 31, 1965 (§ 4-11.1 to 4-11.7)

Subpart 4-12 - Flame Safeguard Control Requirements For Oil Burners Installed After March 31, 1965 (§ 4-12.1 to 4-12.8)

Subpart 4-13 - Special Requirements For Low Pressure Steel Plate Boilers (§ 4-13.1 to 4-13.4)

Subpart 4-14 - Special Requirements For Cast-iron Boilers (§ 4-14.1 to 4-14.4)

Subpart 4-15 - Hydrostatic Tests (§ 4-15.1 to 4-15.3 to 4-15.8)

Subpart 4-16 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 4

Statutory authority: Labor Law, §§27, 27-a, 29, 200, 204

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
